step1: Buy an abandoned gas station and restore it to its full glory. Renovate, upgrade and expand upon the offered services to keep up with your clients demands.
step2: Buy an abandoned gas station in the middle of nowhere and restore it to its former glory.You can’t sell what you don’t have. Keeping track of your stock is important and ordering at the right time for the right price helps to keep profits up.
step3: You don’t need to stay small. You can expand your gas station to be able to serve more customers.
step5: The game offers a wide array of options to customize what you have already built and lots of decorations to further enhance the uniqueness of the place.
step6: Serving your customers is key in running your gas station with success. They all expect to have their cars filled up, their shopping done right away
step7: While you can try, it most cases running a gas station that has been expanded and upgraded offering lots of different services
